text:
Hi Everyone,

I am looking for someone with experience in HubSpot integrations to *consult* on a large scale integration via an iPaas service. You would need to be available for ±6 hours per day during the work day (as close to GMT+2 as possible) for ±6 weeks.
Hi, I am a certified HubSpot developer i would like to work with you :innocent:

Hi

I'm looking for a HubSpot module that combines both a slider and a toggle system.

Specifically, I offer 3 different pricing plans, and I want the price for each plan to be adjustable based on the number of seats and two additional options that the customer can choose.

Hi Maxime,

I can help you with the HubSpot module that combines both a slider and a toggle system.

Please check my HubSpot Modules <https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/modules?eco_providers=oAppsIT>
So you can create a custom module for HubSpot
what are your price for this kind of job?
<@U06LU1GCM32> i have built a couple of these and one for a very popular HubSpot theme.
I have a great record in the HubSpot community and

Hi <@U060YL9T953>
Hope you are well!!
We can certainly help you with your requirements and would like to inform you that Dotsquares Technologies, a HubSpot partner.
we have good expertise with working HubSpot CMS Websites with DND and Theme-based websites with Dynamic page creation using HubDB.
we are pleased to inform we have won the *HubSpot Themes Challenge 2021*. With extensive experience in theme development, we offer competitive rates for creative digital design and development. To discuss your requirements further,
Explore our developed themes here: <https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/website?eco_providers=Dotsquares%20Lt>
Visit our website
<https://crmsolutions.dotsquares.com/HubSpot/>
Additionally, I've provided more details via direct message along with our standard rates.

Hello  <@U06KSBB64AF>
Please check DM

Thank You
